item.title: MySQL: Create User and Database
item.description: Login with mysql client Create new user CREATE USER 'new_user'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'password'; In order to grant all privileges of the database for a newly created user, execute the following command: GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON * . * TO 'new_user'@'localhost'; // grant on all GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON database_name.* TO 'username'@'localhost'; For changes to take effect immediately flush these privileges by typing in the command: FLUSH PRIVILEGES; Revoke Privileges REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON * .
